attributes.action: Order Cameron to disclose what position he will take up at the EU in future
attributes.additional_details:
The polls at the end of April are neck and neck which proves that even after interventions by the President of the United States and others that there is great confidence in the British public that we could thrive as a strong independent nation outside the EU.
If we have details of the Prime Ministers ambitions after his term in office it may help the undecided voters choose to believe his negative outlook or to ignore it and vote to leave.
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has lost the trust of 73% of the British population according to a recent poll and we the undersigned find it astonishing that the Prime Minister of the UK is making so many negative comments about our great nation.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Any personal plans for the period after he leaves office would be a personal matter for the Prime Minister.
